name: Hyper Plinko
description:
Fresh new 3D Plinko game and free to play! Just easily tap the screen to receive amazing rewards and fun.
Drop the ball to win rewards, the more you drop, the bigger the rewards! And the jackpot is waiting for you!
Download Hyper Plinko now and win your jackpot! See how lucky and skilled you are! A rain of rewards is waiting for you!

Gameplay Feature:

*Simple: Tap the screen to drop the ball
*Exciting: Consecutive dropping, the more the impact, the more the fun
*Rewards: Go through the ring, spin the slots and win the jackpot!
